column4: anyone know of a way to get crashplan installed and working under lucid ?   the command line input that was supposed to launch the GUI portion didn't do anything.  i'll try prefixing it with sudo
its a no go sudo sudo crashplan &  so if anyone has it working under lucid i'd like to hear about it.  the idea of unlimited family plans is very appealing
i'll double check but i'm pretty sure i did i'm all blabberfingers everywhere i go :)
